description: Workflow plugin hooks for automated validation

hooks.command: FILE="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; case "$FILE" in *.ts|*.tsx) npx tsc --noEmit 2>&1 | grep -E "$(basename "$FILE")" | head -5 || true ;; *.php) php -l "$FILE" 2>&1 || true ;; *.py) python3 -m py_compile "$FILE" 2>&1 || true ;; *.json) python3 -c "import json; json.load(open('$FILE'))" 2>&1 || true ;; esac

INPUT=$(cat); CMD=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r '.tool_input.command // empty'); if echo "$CMD" | grep -qE 'rm -rf|git push --force'; then echo "Blocking dangerous command: rm -rf and git push --force are not allowed" >&2; exit 2; fi; exit 0
